title: Looking For Main Support
body:
Hello Summoners , im a plat 2 main adc and looking for a main supp , between plat 5 and plat 1 to climb together . 
Ts3 Would be great. 
to me , dropped out of dia this season , cause i was inactiv. now im back & i´ll reach it again!
Im 18 & very active atm
My adc´s are {{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:18}} 
if you like to play with me, im pretty sure we will climb!
Add ME : îLefi
and lets have some gaming fun together!
